detailIntroText: dYmension's blockchain platform is a modular settlement layer that provides all the tools and infrastructure needed to easily launch enshrined rollups as part of the Cosmos ecosystem. This opens up a whole new dimension of decentralized use cases. dYmension introduces a paradigm shift in scaling, allowing for a future where metaverse apps, games, and other ultra-high-throughput services can reside on the blockchain by easily deploying dedicated rollups tailored to their needs.
